wf_workflow_version.description: This workflow re calls the venafi revoke API and revokes the certificates being requested.
wf_workflow_version.name: Revocation Pending Certificates
wf_workflow_version.on_cancel: // This script executes if the workflow is cancelled.// The global variable context_sys_id contains the sys_id of the cancelled workflow context.

wf_workflow.description: This workflow re calls the venafi revoke API and revokes the certificates being requested.
wf_workflow.name: Revocation Pending Certificates

sys_variable_value.value: // Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;
